name: Night Survive
description:
Hi, I am making this game from 4th november. 

In this game you will be kinda rabbit player and you found many enemies with varieties. All you have to do to go ahead and Find Samosa Sur. When You kill samosa sur still you can play the game. So play and enjoy this kinda chunky game

Note:- subtitles are not available yet. But might come after some Updates. There will be a Devlog if subtitles comes

As you know subtitle are not avaiable so I have to give controls:-

A or Left Arrow- move left

D or Right Arrow - move right

Shift or Space - Jump

To damage enemy you have to jump on his head.

If you have gun fire with Left Mouse Button or Ctrl

Don't forget to Go ahead in order to find next checkpoint and save data.

Press 'e' to enter shop

Be aware some enemy will come from below and some just in your size

Play, Enjoy and add comment to say how you liked it
